short_summary: Transport Canada is seeking a contractor to provide Software as a Service (SaaS) to manage Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) Programs
description: Transport Canada requires a contractor to provide Software as a Service (SaaS) to support the management of its Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) programs. The contractor must provide the necessary qualified personnel to support the client in the development, implementation and continuous use of the SaaS. This includes internal (within the company) personnel who have an expertise in health and safety. The contractor will be assessed based on capabilities to provide Software as a Service access and functionalities meeting Transport Canada needs to manage to OHS programs including security requirement to host Protected B information. The contract period will be from date of award of contract to March 31, 2028 with up to five (5) option years. The estimated maximum value of the proposed contract is $2.771.973 CAD including applicable taxes.
